動物用藥品名稱: 富道雞里奧活毒疫苗〈雛雞用〉
業者名稱: 臺灣碩騰股份有限公司
地址: 2000 ROCKFORD ROAD, CHARLES CITY, IOWA 50616-9989, USA
效能(適應症): 雛雞：預防雞病毒性關節炎。
ingredients: TENOSYNOVITIS BULK VIRUS (STRAIN#1133,TITER 10^3.9TCID50/DOSE)0.0002ML; STABILIZER(PEPTONE 5%, SUCROSE 5%,N-Z AMINE 2.5%, MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE 0.5%) 0.0038ML; LYOPHILIZEDPRODUCT IS RECONSTITUTED TO 0.2ML PER DOSE WITH STERILE DILUENT.
